typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Emp_sid as string,
		Emp_No as string,
		Emp_Name as string,
		Department as string,
		City as string,
		LastUpdated_Date as date,
		Actie as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		MaxKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(emp_sid) as MaxKey from Dim_Employee\n',
	format: 'query') ~> Maxkey
source(output(
		{Emp_No } as string,
		{Emp Name } as string,
		{Department } as string,
		City as string,
		LastUpdated_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> stg
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Emp_sid,
		Emp_No,
		Emp_Name,
		Department,
		City,
		LastUpdated_Date,
		Actie
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectemp
stg, Maxkey join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, Selectemp lookup({Emp_No } == Emp_No,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(Emp_No, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull({Emp_No }),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NEW, EXIST)
ConditionalSplit1@NEW derive(Active = 1) ~> DerActiveColumn
DerActiveColumn sink(input(
		Emp_sid as string,
		Emp_No as string,
		Emp_Name as string,
		Department as string,
		City as string,
		LastUpdated_Date as date,
		Actie as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Emp_sid,
		Emp_No,
		Emp_Name,
		Department,
		Actie
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DimEmpsink
